Question.Subject: What will happen if I don't give the money back?
Question.Content: I sold a phone on ebay and the shipped it out fast, well when the buyer got it he tells me it was in a bad condition and was broke, I sent it out in a perfect condition so wouldn't recept a return, he opened a case and won, I recieved the item back but its clearly been broken after he got it, I already used the money and i refuse to give him the money back
Question.ChosenAnswer: Then you will be sued in the court of law. Unless you have proof that before you ship it it as in perfect condition.

Answer.Content: Then you will be sued in the court of law. Unless you have proof that before you ship it it as in perfect condition.
